sentences.sContent: ...illegal campers who persist in flouting the law.
sentences.sCn: …一向无视法律的非法露营者。

remMethod.val: fl(=fly， 飞) + out(出去) → 飞出去 → 不再服从命令 → 违抗

trans.tranCn: 轻视, 嘲笑, 愚弄
trans.tranOther: If you flout something such as a law, an order, or an accepted way of behaving, you deliberately do not obey it or follow it
